fields.summary: Outputs declaration not fully honored in CloudFormation

fields.environment:
* single cluster, non-HA
* 1 x CLC, DNS, Cloudformation
* 1 x UFS
* 1 x UFS, Walrus
* 1 x CC, SC (Overlay)
* 2 x NCs

comments.body:
[~viglesias],

Tested this with master branch from euca2ools repo on Github.
{code}
# euca-version
euca2ools 3.1.0-17-g941498f (Omega)
eucalyptus 4.0.1
{code}

Issue still exists.  The response from CloudFormation is correct, however euform-describe-stacks isn't handling the option correctly:

* with _NoEcho_ set to False
{code}
<DescribeStacksResponse xmlns="http://cloudformation.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-15/"><DescribeStacksResult><Stacks><member><Capabilities/><CreationTime>2014-08-08T15:12:43.183Z</CreationTime><Description>Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group</Description><DisableRollback>false</DisableRollback><LastUpdatedTime>2014-08-08T15:13:20.361Z</LastUpdatedTime><NotificationARNs/><Outputs><member><OutputKey>InstanceId</OutputKey><OutputValue>i-D207791E</OutputValue></member><member><OutputKey>AZ</OutputKey><OutputValue>ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors</OutputValue></member><member><OutputKey>PublicIP</OutputKey><OutputValue>10.104.6.230</OutputValue></member></Outputs><Parameters><member><ParameterKey>UbuntuImageId</ParameterKey><ParameterValue>emi-5FF95D61</ParameterValue></member><member><ParameterKey>Acct1User01KeyPair</ParameterKey><ParameterValue>account1-user01</ParameterValue></member></Parameters><StackId>arn:aws:cloudformation:bigboi:408396244283:stack/DockerStack2/aeeb0792-686a-4bd4-867f-197cd5ffd71f</StackId><StackName>DockerStack2</StackName><StackStatus>CREATE_COMPLETE</StackStatus><StackStatusReason>Complete!</StackStatusReason><Tags/></member></Stacks></DescribeStacksResult><ResponseMetadata><RequestId>6c0f0dd0-09fa-40fe-b312-56ba8a341b25</RequestId></ResponseMetadata></DescribeStacksResponse>
2014-08-08 18:26:46,718 DEBUG   DescribeStacks -- end of response content --
STACK	DockerStack2	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group	2014-08-08T15:12:43.183Z
arn:aws:cloudformation:bigboi:408396244283:stack/DockerStack2/aeeb0792-686a-4bd4-867f-197cd5ffd71f
{}
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-D207791E
OUTPUT	AZ	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.104.6.230
{code}

* with _NoEcho_ set to True
{code}
<DescribeStacksResponse xmlns="http://cloudformation.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-15/"><DescribeStacksResult><Stacks><member><Capabilities/><CreationTime>2014-08-09T00:59:10.285Z</CreationTime><Description>Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group</Description><DisableRollback>false</DisableRollback><LastUpdatedTime>2014-08-09T00:59:40.128Z</LastUpdatedTime><NotificationARNs/><Outputs><member><OutputKey>InstanceId</OutputKey><OutputValue>i-9D4D7093</OutputValue></member><member><OutputKey>AZ</OutputKey><OutputValue>ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors</OutputValue></member><member><OutputKey>PublicIP</OutputKey><OutputValue>10.104.6.231</OutputValue></member></Outputs><Parameters><member><ParameterKey>UbuntuImageId</ParameterKey><ParameterValue>****</ParameterValue></member><member><ParameterKey>Acct1User01KeyPair</ParameterKey><ParameterValue>****</ParameterValue></member></Parameters><StackId>arn:aws:cloudformation:bigboi:408396244283:stack/DockerStack/72c6b7b0-5b1b-4695-b4b5-e9610a8f94c1</StackId><StackName>DockerStack</StackName><StackStatus>CREATE_COMPLETE</StackStatus><StackStatusReason>Complete!</StackStatusReason><Tags/></member></Stacks></DescribeStacksResult><ResponseMetadata><RequestId>aa0473c6-38d1-45d5-aab2-1e4cccc5b4a8</RequestId></ResponseMetadata></DescribeStacksResponse>
2014-08-08 18:28:01,645 DEBUG   DescribeStacks -- end of response content --
STACK	DockerStack	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group	2014-08-09T00:59:10.285Z
arn:aws:cloudformation:bigboi:408396244283:stack/DockerStack/72c6b7b0-5b1b-4695-b4b5-e9610a8f94c1
{}
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-9D4D7093
OUTPUT	AZ	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.104.6.231
{code}

This is fixed in commit {{56e5b3a}}.

The server's response does not include any {{NoEcho}} information at all, so {{euform-describe-stacks}} has no choice but to output everything the server sends in the clear.  If parameter values are meant to be obfuscated the service will need to handle this.  That would be a separate bug.
